values:
So, the world's going to hate me because I haven't updated for like, years and years and years and years and it took me forever to add Ash&Izzy. *weeps* I'M SO SORRY!!!

So. Nothing interesting happened today.

Lots of homework.

Back to school.

Got up early.

Gave Mike a hug. I finally decided to yell at him for being too tall so everytime I hug him, his shoulder always jabs me in the face. xD; Painful...

My icon fascinates me. It goes on for like, FOREVER. And what the hell am I listening to?! Brothers is over... O_o;  Oooooooooh, Link! I was afraid it was Roy singing again... >.<

New sn: nunsxguns

Hello world. Rebekah updates her LJ for the first time since 560 BC. ((Haha, I should change it to say that. xD))

So, I'm in CA for the holidays with my family, and just got here yesterday, am mad tired but not tired at the same time. xD Does that make any sense? Doubt it, haha.

I love my friends. I've gotten all these amazing gifts from everybody.

Ash: this black necklace choker that is dangly. Okay, that's not very descriptive is it. xD
Ce: This awesome black shirt from Delia's with like, neon hearts all over it.
Jess: YAY. BROWNIES AND COOKIES. :D
Meg: Photo holder with a PUPPY on it!
Mike: The cutest teddy bear in the world.
Claire R: This really pretty bracelet with dragonflies and hearts on it.
Claire G: A button bracelet she made herself! ^^
Thanh: Shower gel and hand soap. xD
Erin: Another really cool bracelet with pretty blueness.
Caroline: Two things of shampoo
Erica: CANDY AND ANIMAL CRACKERS.

... *goes off to eat breakfast*

Dave, Fil and I are remeniscing the good old days of Summer '05... Lmfao.

"I don't wanna go back..."
"Then we won't."
"Turn around so it looks like we didn't know it started again."
"Hmm, these are very interesting bricks... *drops Nantucket Nectars* Holy... Hmm, now how did that happen?"

Lmfao. I love you guys!!

ANYWAYS. The purpose of this journal. I WROTE A POEM LAST NIGHT AT 3 AM AND I WOULD ASK MR. ITO TO CRITIQUE IT BUT...

I'm scared of Mr. Dewees... -.-

Guess what. I'm actually updating my LJ. I would copy and paste from my GJ but today's post was so absolutely pointless, none of you will want to read it. Stupid relationship quizzes. *stab*

Everybody wants me to do a second chapter for my Boulevard of Broken Dreams songfic. I'm both honored and pressured. It was supposed to be a one-shot but I forgot to put it up there and now everybody is like WRITE MORE OR I'LL CRY and I'm just like NUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU DON'T CRY~!! xD Well, I'm honored that people like my stuff so much, they want to read more of it. xD

Tina and I are going to write a fanfic together. :O! It's a Yu Yu Hakusho fic. xD The only complication is that we each have to write entire chapters and I'm starting. xD Oh dear.

Nathan is a spoiled brat. He always has to get his way but around guests, he pretends to be this angel person and everybody is like OMG I WISH I HAD HIM AS A BROTHER HE IS SO CUTE AND SO NICE. WTF, NO. I'M SERIOUS. IF YOU ONLY KNEW.

I'm just going to leave now.

It's been 2 months and 6 days. I wonder if he still remembers who I am.
Hi. I can't read Chinese. :O Lie, I can read it... Sorta. I can read like, 10 characters. Ok, never mind. I can read more. But not a lot. So there. Bye.

*sighs* I am so bored. So bored and lonely. I wish somebody would get on AIM and talk to me, or e-mail me, or call me. Life can be awfully lonely sometimes. I turn my music up all the way just to make sure I haven't been completely rejected by the world. *sigh* Sometimes, I feel as if I'm not a part of this world, that I don't really exist. I'm just an imaginary friend and life is all just a dream. Life is harsh, life is the road less traveled, without a path worn in to follow. Occasionally, you'll see the faint bearings of a path that will guide you for a time but eventually, they'll fade even more and disappear, leaving you as confused and lost as you were before but you continue aimlessly, hoping you're going the right way.

I'm reading Artemis Fowl: The Opal Deception right now. It's really sad... *tear*


Commander Root dies. Everybody (fairies I mean) thinks Holly shot him. Then Opal, who's behind all this, launches a bio-bomb, Artemis and Butler as her targets. Butler manages to save the two but Artemis has broken two ribs and Butler is unconcious. Opal tries to kill Holly but fails but Holly's helmet things are all blown up so everybody below thinks she's dead. Happy, huh?


<3 Becka

Hello world. I am so proud of myself, I created an LJ. Well, my 2nd to be percise but, nobody really cares about that do they? I dunno. Uhm, this is gonna be my fic journal, yay Ash. Now, I hafta think of something to write... XD I'll just improvise... Oh boy, this'll be fun. XD Now here is my very depressing drabble. Yay. Let's go. Tears stung Saki's eyes as she stumbled blindly down the steep hill to the little clearing in the woods. She collapsed near the edge of the lake, silver with the moonlight. Tonight, the moon was full. The circle of moon was reflected in the smooth surface of the lake, small ripples emerging from where small fish leapt and danced. Saki couldn't take it anymore. She had been so stupid, given her heart to someone she knew who would never love her. But what could she do? It hurt, hurt so much. But there was nothing she could do about it. Her tears fell from her eyes like raindrops on a rainy day. They landed in the lake, forming small ripples on the smooth surface. Thoughts raced through her mind. How could he? How could he? How could he? Life could be so harsh sometimes. So cruel, so uncaring, so cold. Why? She thought. Why me? Life had never been generous. Instead, life had snatched away all the things she had ever loved or cared for. Her mother had died when she was young and her father, driven crazy by grief, had decided it was her fault. He had kicked her out of the house at age 8, to survive in a world so cruel and cold. For days, she had wandered through the city, begging for food and money. The city did not take kindly to another homeless begger. Even the orphanage didn't want her. She would only cost them money. No benefit for them, why should they do it? She survived a year in the city. Then, the city dumped her with her uncle, her last living relative. She lived in yet another hell for 6 years. At least she lived in a house. But it would never be a home. But then, she had met Akira. Smiling, he had offered her both food and shelter. She was grateful. With the worry of finding a home and food out of her mind, she quickly found a job. These were the good days, when everything seemed good, and when it wasn't, Akira was there. When she cried, he'd hug her and kiss all her tears away. When she felt down, Akira had always cheered her up in various different ways. Akira had meant everything to her. And he took everything from her. But there were times when, at least, he had pretended he loved her. But there was no doubt she loved him. In the end, it all turned out to be a lie. A lie. That's all her life had ever been, a lie. Her life had been nothing. Just a bunch of shit pulled together by a fraying thread. And now, the thread was going to break. Life meant nothing to her now. Akira was the only one... The only one who actually made her feel special, wanted, loved. The only one who ever made her smile, laugh, cheered her up. He had always been there for her. At least, he pretended to be. But in the end, it was all a lie. How could somebody be so cruel? As to take somebody, tell them that they loved them, act this way for a few weeks and then, tell them they didn't love them. A lie, that's all life ever was. A lie. Sighing softly, she rolled up the sleeves of her tattered blouse. The faded scars scratching deep into her wrists seemed to glow with some sort of unearthly light. Each scar had a story behind it, written by an invisible hand in invisible ink, a story of tragedy, broken hearts, unrequited love. Each story, full of pain, anger, hate. Each scar represented a thousand scars that cut into her soul, taking a chunk of her one by one, bit by bit. She pulled out her switchblade, looking at her reflection in the shiny blade, it's end stained a faint crimson red. She sighed, looking at the ghost of the person she could've been. The person she had been, when Akira... Every time she said his name, thought his name, it hurt. It hurt worse than sticking a knife in yourself, twisting and then pulling it out. Every time she said his name, thought his name, it broke her heart. Tears forced back started to pour out. She couldn't help it. Akira had been everything to her. He had meant so much. But it was all a lie, all a lie. A tear fell onto the blade of her knife, wobbling slightly and then slipping off the edge. Saki sighed. She had no choice, but honestly, she had no reason, no reason to live any longer. She couldn't take it anymore. No longer was she going to live a life full of pain and shit. She couldn't. She angrily slashed at both of her wrists continuously, the cuts going deeper and deeper. Blood poured out, a crimson river. But the pain was nothing, nothing compared to what Akira had made her go through. Darkness started to eat at the corners of her eyes. This is finally the end... She could feel herself slipping further and further away from life. And finally, she fell. Gone. Her weak flame of life had been extinguished. No tears would be shed over her dead body but, no more tears would be shed from the body. No more tears of blood. Akira... I love you... So cut my wrists and black my eyes so I may fall asleep tonight... Or die...
